features: Fat Oil Lip Drip Lipgloss: Serve glossy, shiny lip makeup looks with our non-sticky lip oil gloss. Our lip gloss is infused with vegan squalane and rich in shine. This hydrating lip gloss delivers up to 12 hours of hydration and protection

Find Your Lip Oil Look: Our 8 universally flattering lip glosses complement a wide range of make up looks. Wear your tinted lip gloss solo for a soft lip tint and hint of lip color, or pair it with your favorite lip product for added intensity
Lip Products for the Perfect Pout: Doll your lips in creamy, long lasting perfection; Try our complete line of lip makeup including liquid lipstick, lip gloss, lip cream, lip liner and butter gloss

Cruelty Free Cosmetics: We believe animals belong in our arms, not in a lab; All of our makeup is certified and acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty free brand; We don't test any of our products on animals

Discover NYX Professional Makeup: Try all of our professional makeup products today from eyeshadow, eyeliner, and false lashes to liquid lipstick, lip gloss, primer, concealer, setting sprays and eyebrow makeup
body.description: Serve high-shine looks without stickiness with Fat Oil Lip Drip—the very first lip drip of its kind. Infused with vegan squalane and rich in shine, this hydrating lip gloss delivers up to 12 hours of hydration and protection. Plus, the gloss comes in eight universally flattering shades to complement a wide range of looks. Wear your tinted lip gloss solo for a soft hint of color, or pair it with your favorite NYX Professional Makeup lip color for added intensity. To help soothe and hydrate dry lips, exfoliate with our #ThisIsEverything Lip Scrub lip treatment before applying your gloss. Try all of our professional makeup products today from eyeshadow, eyeliner, and false lashes to liquid lipstick, lip gloss, primer, concealer, setting sprays and eyebrow makeup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lip oil is very nice. It's hydrating, it's smoothing,non- sticky and really conditions my lips. There's a sheer wash of color, I paired mine with a brown lip liner and it looked great, and surprisingly lasted a decent amount of time! For a lip oil, that's crazy good!!! Give it a try, you won't be disappointed!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this gloss is decent. im not sure i would pay the same price for it again, because its just not that great, but it smells nice, the color can be adjusted to your liking, and its not overly sticky (but is a little bit sticky). i would like to add that it is not a plumping gloss like i assumed when i was buying it. if you look at the product details, it does not say its a plumping gloss, but it did come up when i searched for that, and the name "fat oil lip drip" does seem a bit misleading to me since it has the words fat and lip together. but yeah. its just a regular gloss. not a bad one by any means, but definitely not a plumping gloss.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it, it’ll be good for the economy
reviews.reviewText: So so so very good ! Not sticky ! Cute pigmentation, definitely makes my lips look so kissable. When it finally wears off (I lick my lips a lot), it leaves them pretty moisturized and soft. I give this 10/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Lip Oil. 4.5 Stars
reviews.reviewText: This is the first lip oil I’ve ever tried, and I’m in love with it. I love the color, the smell, and the feel of it. The tint lasts the entire day (though the glossiness doesn’t), so I don’t need to reapply it. The smell is amazing. I do not use this word lightly. I don’t know how to describe it, but the people I’ve asked said it smells like cherry, even though I usually despise that scent and taste. The feel of it on my lips is great, too. I love how it’s a little thick, but not too much. I usually pair it with a Sephora lip liner, and I love the combination.Now, the negative side: the packaging. It isn’t a big issue that causes the actual product to be used with difficulty. It’s more of my pickininess with the color. The lid is a bit too green for my liking, the bottle is too big for the actual amount of product, and the stopper takes out too much product (for me, at least). The bright green lid was initially a little offputting to me before I bought it, but after seeing several people compliment it, I decided to try it. It also immediately tells people what product you’re using. For example, I was in class one day, and I saw this girl discretely take it out of here bag and apply it, and her hands were covering the bottle from view. Because the big, bright green cap was peeking out between her fingers, I immediately knew what product her wws using without even asking. I don’t know if this is a good or bad thing, but I like to be more discrete with what I use, so I don’t like applying it during class because the bright green makes it so easy for the product to catch people’s eyes. However, if you don’t mind it, then go ahead and buy this product because it is amazing. Another thing I dislike is how big the bottle is. It isn’t easy to fit in you pocket, and if it does fit, it leaves a huge, obvious bulge. The last thing is the stopper. I don’t know how the relationship between lip gloss/oil’s stoppers and applicators works, but this take out too much for me, so I dab the extra drop on my bottom lip, then spread the remainder on my top, then go back to the bottom with the side. It isn’t terrible, but it does leave a bit of a mess on top of the stopper when I put the applicator back.Overall, I absolutely love this lip oil, and I would 10/10 buy it again, despite my dislike of the packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this so I could fulfill the overnight shipping quota and was surprised by how nice this is. It feels great on my lips, not overly tinted—matches my complexion, smells nice, and it makes my lips feel nice and supple afterwards. It’s also not that expensive either. I’d buy again just to have another spare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t sure about it at first because I don’t wear a lot of makeup on a day to day basis but I was pleasantly surprised. The color is great and it gives a nice juicy lip look! It does last a fair amount of time but I’m usually always drinking water/coffee and considering that, it does well. Color last longer than the gloss which is also great. Definitely buy this you won’t regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I hate lip gloss, but I love this lip oil. It's smooth, it's not sticky, cute light color and it smells great. I will be buying more. It makes my lips feel hydrated and cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff is great if you want a light tint and not too sticky
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice product that leaves my lips soft hours after applied. It's pretty, moisturizing and faint. I chose the shade Status Update, which I think is nice for brunettes.

reviews.reviewTitle: No sé cómo no lo compré antes
reviews.reviewText: La consistencia no es para nada pesada, huele súper rico a frambuesa, no se siente nada pegajoso y en los labios se ve muy bonito. Compré el tono Supermodel, el color que deja es ligero, muy natural pero sí se nota la diferencia. Además es muy cómodo de llevar. El aplicador es grueso, así que se aplica muy fácil y rápido. No dura mucho tiempo en los labios, pero así son todos los glosses y lip oils. Definitivamente compraré más tonos.

reviews.reviewTitle: Hydrating Gloss with a Subtle Pop of Color
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using the NYX Professional Makeup Fat Oil Lip Drip in the 02 MISSED CALL shade, and it’s a delightful addition to my makeup routine. The product promises 12-hour hydration, and it delivers. My lips feel moisturized throughout the day, which is a big win for me as I often struggle with dry lips.The texture is one of its best features. It’s non-sticky, a significant departure from many lip glosses that can feel tacky. This makes it comfortable to wear for extended periods.The color 02 MISSED CALL is a lovely pink shade that provides a subtle but noticeable tint. It enhances the natural color of my lips without being overpowering, making it perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions.The vegan formula is another aspect I appreciate, aligning with my preference for cruelty-free and environmentally conscious beauty products.The gloss applies smoothly, and the packaging is both functional and stylish, fitting easily into a purse or makeup bag.My reason for giving it four stars instead of five is its longevity. While it hydrates for hours, I find the need to reapply the gloss for maintaining the color, as it doesn’t last as long as the hydration does.In summary, the NYX Professional Makeup Fat Oil Lip Drip in 02 MISSED CALL is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a hydrating, non-sticky lip gloss with a hint of color. It’s a versatile product that can elevate your daily makeup look while providing lasting comfort.

Questi Fat Oil sono fantastici! Ad un prezzo conveniente si ha un prodotto molto valido: colori davvero belli e portabili in ogni occasione, veramente idratanti e comodi sulle labbra, ovviamente vanno riapplicati spesso ma è un "inconveniente" ovvio per questo tipo di prodotto. Consigliati.
Je recommande ce gloss super hydratant et glowy qui va avec toutes les teintes, très bon rapport qualité prixIl est super joli et je vais acheter touts les 8😍😍

I bought this because I was looking for a lip oil that doesn’t stick like lipgloss does. On the description it says that it doesn’t stick so obviously I assumed that’s true but when I got and tried it it actually does. It’s just like lipgloss, it’s not really a lip oil to me.
